title.rendered: MARCH – JUNE 2020: CAMPAIGN FOR NUCLEAR DISARMAMENT

content.rendered:
This campaign was implemented as part of the Move the Nuclear Money global Campaign in partnership with UNFOLD ZERO and abolition 2000. It has contributed to involve and engaged a dozen of girls in the implementation of the United Nations Secretary General Global Ceasefire, Nuclear Nonproliferation and Disarmament. The project implementation was composed by two components key components namely:

  • Girls videos for Nuclear Nonproliferation and Disarmament
  • Girls memes for Nuclear Nonproliferation and Disarmament
